website_summaries.verdict: The Acer Aspire Switch 10 is a detachable Windows tablet that offers a mix of new and exciting features, and while it's not perfect, it's worth a look for its flexibility.
pros: In-Plane Switching (IPS) display with scratch-resistant Gorilla Glass 3
Multiple-position dock allows four different use modes
Comes with free activation code for Microsoft Office

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: For the money it's a great deal. Lightweight, easy to set up and use. It is important to be gentle when attaching the touch screen to the key board because you can not bend the top over the bottom without breaking the points so I would not give it to a student However for under £300 i think it is brilliant and I am delighted it with it
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: In tablet mode the windows button starts firing on its own so the start screen keeps popping over the top of my work. Then narrator turns itself on and it becomes impossible to do anything including rebooting the thing. Checked google for a fix, It seems to be a widespread issue with no solution. The BIOS upgrade reportedly does not fix this issue so returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Acer Aspire Switch 10 SW5-011 10.1 inch.
customer_reviews.text: At first I struggled to see the screen and the Icons on the Acer Aspire Switch, so I asked to return it to Amazon. But some helpful advice given by Matthew from The Outlet Shop soon put me right and I was able to see the screen and set the Acer Aspire up! So I have decided to keep it and I find its a joy to use and I am learning something new on it every Day!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Gordon Papworth

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I wanted - replace a 15" laptop ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for what I wanted - replace a 15" laptop and a 7" tablet with one system. Also it gives me the chance to play with Windows 8.1. - but I still use my Windows 7 desktop when doing real computing. Only problem is that the system arrived without the MPI (Microsoft Product Identification) card for Office 365 and I haven't found an answer to that yet without sending the whole thing back.
customer_reviews.author: C Watson

customer_reviews.title: works well as a tablet and the keyboard is very good chiclet style
customer_reviews.text: Well built, works well as a tablet and the keyboard is very good chiclet style. Excellent screen.The processor and memory are towards the bottom end of the spectrum but more than adequate for word processing, web surfing etc. I bought this along with an external, portable hard drive and the combination suits my needs to a T.
customer_reviews.author: James Ito

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me - keyboard was not great, and home under the screen button was the ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me - keyboard was not great, and home under the screen button was the faulty type - lots of issues reported online. Sent it back and went for a lenovo thinkpad Yoga instead.
customer_reviews.author: J. George

customer_reviews.title: Great value, nice little machine.
customer_reviews.text: At the end of the day it is a mid level dual purpose machine, so it is never going to me the BEST tablet, or the BEST laptop you can buy. Having said that it performs well enough in each mode and with an Amazon cashback deal on it was tremendous value so I have zero regrets about buying it and would do so again tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Carl J Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop/tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is what a tablet should be like. It's made to be a laptop with a touch screen. We have 2 in our house and with Microsoft Office included it is a worthwhile investment.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Boy

customer_reviews.title: The business, does everything that 8. 1 should ...
customer_reviews.text: The business, does everything that 8.1 should.I installed 128gb memory card in slot so no problem with storage, especially with microsoft one drive and cloud
customer_reviews.author: Doug Maclennan

customer_reviews.title: Ace machine
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this extremely versatile machine as much, if not more, than her laptop. She starts Uni soon and thinks she will be lost without it.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Acer aspire switch 10 review
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is not great. Sometimes even when battery is full you require to plug in power cable before it will start. Tends to crash when you separate screen from keyboard and you need to force a power down and reboot
customer_reviews.author: David J. Mundell

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality tablet
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality tablet, screen too sensitive, battery life very poor, very good concept but does not live up expectations of a tablet or laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Upen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Excellent little machine. Now use it instead of my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: boom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Power connection poor design - usb power would be better
customer_reviews.author: Peter Busen

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend :)
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on Sunday and I have it today! Just getting it all set up. I'm very impressed so far! Can now get started on my course work :)
customer_reviews.author: Carla Green

customer_reviews.title: Amazing convertible tablet
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this tablet, my partner loves it too .... probably buying another soon.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Falzon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop/tablet combo!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item. Does everything a mid range laptop can do and also doubles as a powerful tablet. Awesome screen, Windows Office included.......Superb value!
customer_reviews.author: Michael N.

customer_reviews.title: Nearly there
customer_reviews.text: started having keyboard issues - keyboard is acting up. It doubles the letters, it freezes and am forced too use the onscreen touch keyboard and you cannot see what you are typing. Memory issues come up, if there are about 12-13 sites open and also have other applications open (MS Paint) at the same time. Thrice the machine refused to start and had to long press the power button.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Mixed opinions.
customer_reviews.text: Generally good, keyboard has a nice feel to it, touch screen is good. However, the things that poke out of the keyboard into the screen have begun to creak, the mouse pad is pretty awful and sometimes when using the volume buttons, the narrator is activated. Battery life is good, and start up time is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Oli

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Information
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why this item is advertised as including Microsoft Office when it is only offering a 30 day trial of same. A bit misleading if you ask me.......
customer_reviews.author: Alison Kavanagh

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday, had a bit of a play, slow for an SSD. Tried to use it today, won't even switch on. Just what I need! Oh and also no Microsoft anything included as it says on the ad. No way of contacting seller.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good to be part of the 'next generation'
customer_reviews.text: It has been a great joy getting to know my Acer Aspire, and to find out how much it can do: I'm sure I still have more to discover. The only down-side is that it comes with Office 8.1 (excellent) but without Publisher. Other than this, I have nothing but praise for it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Wilds

customer_reviews.title: I never thought it be be as bad, I already have a iPad which is ideal ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had to send it back due to being a problem for my old fingers to control,I never thought it be be as bad,I already have a iPad which is ideal but windows on such a small screen is terrible. This would be a good product for young people with supple fingers and good eyesight but definitely would not recommend it for the elderly.
customer_reviews.author: Jaq

customer_reviews.title: Could have been good if done correctly.
customer_reviews.text: vertically unusable as it is intended, when it powers up from sleep it crashes, when you remove the tablet from the dock it crashes. the micro sd card constantly drops off. its a shame because this would have been so good it acer had fixed these bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Deric Wormleighton

customer_reviews.title: great laptop/tablet
customer_reviews.text: this is what I think the best laptop/tablet developed by acer it is fantastic and the internet speed is really fast it is also very responsive with whatever button u press the best piece of technology I have ever used. it is also very light-weight and is easily token of the keybord
customer_reviews.author: paddywagon

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it sounds...
customer_reviews.text: Great design but... Poor battery life, screen freezes and problems with WiFi as it keeps dropping out. Only way to connect is to do restart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my new tablet laptop
customer_reviews.text: Love my new tablet laptop! Have mostly been using it as a tablet, but the attachable magnetic keyboard is really cool. Just getting my head around Windows 8, but so far so good! The different setup modes are great for movies and TV throughout the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry R.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I made the switch!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with purchase for my daughter. Great out of box experience, easy to set up and simple to use, pretty responsive and looks great. The Tablet to "Laptop" conversion is really cool. Good device for family.
customer_reviews.author: I. A. Hunter

product_meta.title: Acer Aspire Switch 10 SW5-011 10.1-inch Convertible Tablet PC with Keyboard (Atom Z3740 1.33GHz, 2GB RAM, 32GB Memory, eMMC, WLAN, BT Webcam, Windows 8.1, Microsoft Office Included)
product_meta.description:
ACER ASPIRE SWITCH 10 CONVERTIBLE TABLET PC WITH KEYBOARD WITH MICROSOFT OFFICE INCLUDED
The Aspire Switch 10 knows design doesn't only live in a static image. Design lives in use. It is the feeling of the metal under fingers, a smooth release, a conveniently slim profile. Acer Snap Hinge design is flipping, folding, docking, detaching and all of the activities that ensue. The Aspire Switch 10's Intel Atom processor and Microsoft InstantGo means a smooth, fast experience and less time wasted. AcerCloud allows you to access your files anywhere on any device. Its more productive, which means you can be too. Use the Aspire Switch 10 as a portable tablet, type with its keyboard for productivity, pivot its screen to share a presentation with others, or flip it to watch a movie when space is limited. Switch between laptop, tablet, display screen and tent modes to enhance your work and play. Whether you're an indoors person, an outdoors person, or a bit of both, the Aspire Switch 10 is designed to be used everywhere you go. Its LumiFlex display technology provides optimised colour control that lets you watch videos and share photos even under the sun.

Enables the tablet to be attached in both modes View larger SNAP HINGE
Easily clip and unclip the tablet from its dock: metallic hooks for a strong hold; plastic coating to protect the metal hooks and ensure a soft clip. Built to be flexible and thick.

ONE DEVICE. THREE MODES. MORE FUN.
Laptop -- Optimal efficiency for work and productivity. Precise and ample keys for a comfortable tying experience.

Display -- Present your PowerPoints or lead a video conference. Narrow space? No fear.

Tablet -- Load your favourite webpages, play exciting games or watch the latest movies. All in the palm of your hand.

BRUSH PATTERN AND ALUMINIUM COVER
The rear cover of the tablet is made from aluminum and NIL technology with gentle gray cross brush pattern. The Acer logo is diamond cut with semi-glossy finish.

Nano Imprint Lithography -- This is a micro molding with high throughput, scale resolution, and energy saving process. The imprint can apply to various material and gives freedom to design new pattern.

View larger ULTRA MOBILE. THIN. LIGHT
The Aspire Switch 10 is 8.9mm (tablet) and 20.2mm (with docking) thin. It weights 1.17kg.

Air bonding vs. Direct bonding view larger DISPLAY WITH IPS TECHNOLOGY
Wide viewing angle: Consistent images, colour and brightness from a viewing angle of up to 178 degrees.

Excellent touch resistance: No ripple effect when touching the screen.

DIRECT BONDING VS. AIR BONDING
Air Bonding Technology: This bonding method results in 0.5mm air gap between the touch panel substrate and the LCD. 

Direct Bonding Technology: This bonding method removes all air and air bubbles from the viewing area, providing a more rugged and optically attractive solution, brighter and sharper images; superb contrast and better readability under the sun.

LumiFlex.
On: Bright and colour contrast.
Off: Over exposure and dim view larger LUMIFLEX SOLUTION
Optimise the visibility of your screen during your outdoor activities.

MICROSOFT INSTANTGO
Stay up-to-date whenever a network connection is available.

Incredible Instant on user experience: Less than 300ms exit latency from power button press to display enabled.

Real-time data refresh: Instantly receive notice whenever you are with an available network connection.

Efficient power-saving: Less than 5% battery drain over 16 hours period in InstantGo.

When suspended you can:

 * Update live tiles with fresh content 
 * Receive emails 
 * Receive Instant Message and VoIP calls notices 
 * Download files from, or uploading them to, a website
 * Play background music 
 * Synchronise content with cloud or a tethered device 

COMFY TYPING EXPERIENCE -- TOUCHPAD
Same visual experience as using a touchscreen: supports 6 core Windows 8 Touchpad gestures, improved navigation experience and is optimised to be as smooth as gestures on a touchscreen.

Enhanced sensitivity and accuracy: image sensor technology delivers greater sensitivity and palm-rejection, minimised Accidental Contact Mitigation (ACM).

AT A GLANCE:
 * Snap Hinge connection provides a latch-less, wobble-free touch experience
 * Switch easily from one mode to another: laptop, tablet, display
 * Architectonic brush pattern on a soft gray aluminum rear cover
 * 8.9mm (tablet) and 20.2mm (with docking) thin
 * Weight 1.17kg
 * Large 10.1" HD screen
 * Zero Air Gap and IPS technologies for vibrant colours at any viewing angle
 * LumiFlex solution adjusts the colour saturation of the display to optimise the readability of your screen
 * Intel Atom (Bay Trail T) Quad-core CPU enables fast performance for multitasking all the day long
 * Microsoft Office included
 * Windows 8.1 with Microsoft InstantGo keeps it updated anytime
 * Comfortable keyboard and touchpad enhance typing and navigation
 * Embedded HDD in the docking keyboard (optional)
